W​P​&​C​S ​Airport​ Transit

For your connecting flight, you need not to worry about the tiresome procedures of transiting at JKIA airport! Just choose our elect WP&CS VIP or CIP Transit meet and greet services and we shall expedite your airport transition.

  • Home
  • / Transit

Transit

For a stress-free airport transit

  • Your VIP transit starts at the arrival gate, where our host will welcome you with a personalized name board and ends at the boarding gate when seeing you off.
  • You will be provided assistance through Transfer Desk and/or check-in formalities and security checks.
  • After the formalities, you can relax in the available airport lounges.
  • The host will constantly monitor the time of your connecting flight and alert you about the boarding time
  • If required and where possible, you will be provided Transfer between Terminals.
  • You will be escorted to the departure boarding gate by our well trained customer service agents and will be provided priority boarding where available
